topics.body:
A bit of news:
There's at least 20 appeals cases piling up on gay marriage bans.

What does this mean?  Well chances are gay marriage will be legal in the super majority of the usa within a year.  At this point the anti-glbt movement knows they're screwed; they have to hear the appeals cases cause if they don't then gay marriage will be legalized, if they hear the appeals cases it's going to be legalized.
